metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2526 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
epan/dissectors/packet-hiqnet.c in the HiQnet dissector in Wireshark 2.0.xbefore 2.0.2 does not validate the data type, which allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) viaa crafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2526` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
tshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wireshark package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1').
